metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14041 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer overflow was discovered in the pgxtoimage function in bin/jp2/convert.c in OpenJPEG 2.2.0. The vulnerability causes an out-of-bounds write, which may lead to remote denial of service or possibly remote code execution.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
